title: Ghostly International
content:
I'm interested in the typeface used for the text "GHOSTLY INTERNATIONAL". Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414144404im_/http:/typophile.com/files/ghostly_6358.jpg)
author: Jonathan Clede

comments.content:
Thank you, Paul! That looks correct.  
WhatTheFont found some similar faces, but not this one.
